item.title: Need Help With A Command
item.dc:creator: @C_Imbued C++ Imbued
item.description:
@C_Imbued wrote:

public final int[][] Unspawnable = {{4014, 4021}}; The red numbers is where you can put w.e item ID you want once done that Make a method in which if it’s inside that Array there It’s non spawnable in ur item command; I would suggest using a loop statement though for example.

what that statement does is. counts from 0 to 11 so far you have to count how many items are in your array including 0 then change the 11 to however many are in ur array

So for example say i have 300 Items in my list i will put

Hope it helped don’t forget to declare it as unspawnable.
